term.title: thiocarboxylic acids

item.text: Compounds in which one or both oxygens of a carboxy group have been replaced by divalent sulfur RC(=O)SH or RC(=S)OH monothiocarboxylic acids, RC(=S)SH dithiocarboxylic acids.
